original_text: Nobody who lives in Zion will say, ‘I am ill.’ And God will forgive their sins. Nobody who lives in Zion will say, ‘I am ill.’ And God will forgive their sins. Nobody who lives in Zion will say, ‘I am ill.’ And God will forgive their sins. Nobody who lives in Zion will say, ‘I am ill.’
korean_text: 그 거주민은 내가 병들었노라 하지 아니할 것이라 거기에 사는 백성이 사죄함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: And God will forgive their sins.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님은 그들의 죄를 용서하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: And God will forgive their sins.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님은 그들의 죄를 용서하실 것이다
